casebody.data:
ESSEX AND HUDSON LAND IMPROVEMENT COMPANY, A CORPORATION, RELATOR, v. STATE HIGHWAY COMMISSION, RESPONDENT. Decided October 16, 1929.

Before Gummeee, Chief Justice, and Justices Parker and Bodine.

Eor the relatoT, McCarter & English. Eor the respondent, Edward L. Katzenbach and Mark A. Sullivan. Pee Curiam.

The facts in this case are so closely similar to those in Cooper v. State Highway Commission, decided July 7th, 1929, that the writ must be denied for the reasons there stated.
